method.name: get_body_tracking_calibration_state
method.description: Returns the body tracking calibration state.

method.name: get_body_tracking_fidelity_status
method.description: Returns the body tracking fidelity status.

method.name: is_body_tracking_fidelity_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the body tracking fidelity extension is supported.

method.name: is_body_tracking_height_override_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if height override from the body tracking calibration extension is supported.

method.name: is_full_body_tracking_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the body tracking full body extension is supported.

method.name: request_body_tracking_fidelity
method.description: Request that the OpenXR runtime use a specified body tracking fidelity.

method.name: reset_body_tracking_calibration
method.description: Reset the body tracking calibration state.

method.name: suggest_body_tracking_height_override
method.description: Suggest a height override in meters for body tracking calibration to the OpenXR runtime. [b]Note:[/b] this value must be within the range of 0.5 and 3.0 meters.
